passage_text: Singer Boxcar Willie Dies Of Leukemia At 67. BRANSON, Mo. - BoxCar Willie, whose gentle country voice and songs of life on the road evoked memories of a time when hobos watched America pass by from the door of a freight car, died yesterday of leukemia. He was 67. The singer died at home, surrounded by his family and close friends, family spokeswoman Chisai Childs said.
